text: Dante Huckaby (born March 17, 2003) is an American soccer player who plays for Bethlehem Steel in the USL Championship and the Philadelphia Union academy. == Career == Huckaby appeared as an amateur player for USL Championship side Bethlehem Steel during their 2019 season, as well as being part of the Philadelphia Union academy. The following season, he earned a starting role at Center-back alongside Ben Ofeimu. == References == == External links == * Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Philadelphia Union II players Category:Soccer players from Pennsylvania Category:USL Championship players
title: Dante Huckaby
